line.text: When in the chronicle of wasted time
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: I see descriptions of the fairest wights
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And beauty making beautiful old rhyme
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In praise of ladies dead and lovely knights
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Then in the blazon of sweet beauty best
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Of hand of foot of lip of eye of brow
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: I see their antique pen would have expressed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Even such a beauty as you master now
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So all their praises are but prophecies
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Of this our time all you prefiguring
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And for they looked but with divining eyes
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: They had not skill enough your worth to sing
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For we which now behold these present days
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Have eyes to wonder but lack tongues to praise
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
